content: this is a super quick and fun project for st patrick s using a margarine cup you work a crochet cover in a fun pattern stitch repeat and then join to the cup fill with chocolate gold coins to celebrate in style materials sm amt 4-ply ww yarn green crochet hook size f 3 75 mm finishing materials margarine container 2 3/4 in dia at bottom x 3 5/8 in dia at top x 2 1/2 t hole punch tapestry needle sm amt of batting glue gun/glue skill level easy - intermediate
